title: El hijo zurdo
overview: Lola is a wealthy mother with two children who witnesses the drift of the youngest of them, Lorenzo, towards the darkness of a radical group. The story follows the footsteps of today's most uncomfortable, and abounds, by narrating Lola's conflict, in early motherhood and the old stigma of being left-handed. In the attempt to understand and recover her son, Lola will relate to Maru, a mother from a different social class who lives a situation similar to hers.
